Tanks

类 Chara

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Chara
  • 直接已知子类:
    Tank, TerrainColumn, Tree

    public class Chara
extends java.lang.Object
    The Chara class represents a character in the game.

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      • Chara

        public Chara(int xCor,
             int yCor,
             java.lang.Character chara)
        Constructs a Chara object with the specified coordinates and character.
        参数:
        xCor - the x-coordinate of the character
        yCor - the y-coordinate of the character
        chara - the character representation
